name: Etekcity Infrared Thermometer Laser Temperature Gun 774, Meat Food Candy Oven Thermometer for Griddle Accessories, Heat Gun for Cooking Refrigerator Tools, Adjustable Emissivity & Max Measure, Yellow
short_description: 𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐥𝐞 𝐓𝐨𝐨𝐥𝐬: Infrared technology allows you to measure various objects at home and outdoors; Use it for 𝒎𝒆𝒂𝒕, 𝑫𝑰𝒀 𝒄𝒂𝒏𝒅𝒚, 𝒐𝒗𝒆𝒏𝒔, 𝒈𝒓𝒊𝒍𝒍𝒊𝒏𝒈, 𝒇𝒐𝒐𝒅, 𝒄𝒐𝒐𝒌𝒊𝒏𝒈, 𝒂𝒖𝒕𝒐𝒎𝒐𝒕𝒊𝒗𝒆 𝒖𝒔𝒆, 𝑨/𝑪, 𝒓𝒆𝒇𝒓𝒊𝒈𝒆𝒓𝒂𝒕𝒐𝒓𝒔, etc.

𝐁𝐞𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐀𝐜𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐲: The Lasergrip's 12:1 𝒅𝒊𝒔𝒕𝒂𝒏𝒄𝒆-𝒕𝒐-𝒔𝒑𝒐𝒕 𝒓𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐 enables you to accurately measure temperatures from a comfortable distance. For best results, position the thermometer approximately 14.17 inches / 36 centimeters away from the target.

𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐮𝐬𝐞: Scan the surface of your object, hold down the trigger of the thermometer gun, get temp anywhere within the range of -58°–842°F / -50°–450°C. Then watch as your result appears on the bright LCD display in less than half a second.

𝐁𝐫𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 & 𝐑𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐚𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲: Each infrared thermometer 𝒇𝒆𝒂𝒕𝒖𝒓𝒆𝒔 𝒂 𝒍𝒂𝒓𝒈𝒆, 𝒃𝒂𝒄𝒌𝒍𝒊𝒕 𝑳𝑪𝑫 𝒔𝒄𝒓𝒆𝒆𝒏, making it easy to read temperatures even in low light. With 2 AAA batteries included, powering up the thermal gun is a cinch.

𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧: The new Lasergrip displays 𝒓𝒆𝒂𝒍-𝒕𝒊𝒎𝒆 𝒕𝒆𝒎𝒑𝒆𝒓𝒂𝒕𝒖𝒓𝒆𝒔 𝒃𝒂𝒔𝒆𝒅 𝒐𝒏 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒂𝒗𝒆𝒓𝒂𝒈𝒆 𝒐𝒇 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒎𝒆𝒂𝒔𝒖𝒓𝒆𝒅 𝒔𝒖𝒓𝒇𝒂𝒄𝒆 𝒂𝒓𝒆𝒂. This means the reading you see reflects the average temperature within the circular area targeted by the infrared sensor — not a single point. It also features a 𝒎𝒂𝒙𝒊𝒎𝒖𝒎 𝒕𝒆𝒎𝒑𝒆𝒓𝒂𝒕𝒖𝒓𝒆 𝒅𝒊𝒔𝒑𝒍𝒂𝒚 for additional insights.
product_description: Etekcity Lasergrip 774 has one of the most classic designs among our infrared thermometer series. Very quality hand feeling, one button to measure, adjustment emissivity, and 2 common temperature units can fulfill the home-use needs. With a non-touch and a laser point switch design, you can measure hot or cold items at a suitable distance, such as the pizza oven, air conditioning/ AC, car engines, swimming pools, bath water, wine coolers, etc. Besides, an easy-use design also provides more convenient pet care, maintaining a comfortable temp environment for reptiles and hairless cats. product_description: Get fast, accurate temperature readings when you need them most with the Vicks SpeedRead Digital Thermometer (V912US). Designed for the whole family, this digital thermometer delivers results in just 8 seconds with ±0.2°F accuracy. The Fever InSight® color-coded display makes it easy to interpret temperatures at a glance: green indicates normal, yellow signals a mild elevation, and red alerts to a high fever. Because it can be used as an oral thermometer for adults as well as a rectal thermometer for babies or even used under the arm for toddlers and kids, it’s perfect for the whole family. This thermometer for kids and adults also has a memory feature that recalls and displays last temperature taken, an automatic shut-off for longer battery life and is waterproof for easy, thorough cleaning. FSA/HSA eligible and backed by a 1-year limited warranty, the Vicks SpeedRead is a fast, reliable thermometer you can count on.
